titleInfo.title: Unity in diversity? Muslim civil society and Muslims in civil society in Gujarat, India
Religious diversity in a globalised society: Challenges and responses in Africa and Asia

bibliographicCitation.frontiers: Susewind, R. (2013). “Unity in diversity? Muslim civil society and Muslims in civil society in Gujarat, India” in Religious diversity in a globalised society: Challenges and responses in Africa and Asia, Khudori, D., and Mbokolo, E. eds. (Brawijaya: Univ. Press), 221-228.
